name: Popping Color Ball
description:
Popping Color Ball is the ultimate bubble popping game! Geared towards kids but fun for adults, you will have fun as you burst bubbles in this incredible hand eye coordination game. Select 2 or more adjacent bubbles with the same color and pop them. The more bubbles you pop in a single tap – the more points you earn for every bubble.
Features

- lots of levels
- lots of Worlds
- different balls gravity
- really cool graphics
- custom background music
- custom sound effects
